OB: When large content is put in a text item, the tips for the text item only display the content in one line.
EB: The tips for the text item should display the large content in the expected format, not in a single line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Save the content in a text item
2. Put the mouse pointer over the text item

Expected result: The tips should show the content in the expected format.
Actual result: The tips show the content in one line.
